resources.string: Send a voice message or a picture with some text
Audio is very long ({0}s), this will take some time
You must reply to a message in order to translate it

We do not store any personal data or media content (such as audio or pictures). The only user data we store is the telegram chat id along with the chosen settings. Voice/audio messages are sent to {a href="https://wit.ai/terms"}wit.ai{/a} for transcription, and are immediately deleted after the transcription is completed. Pictures are immediately deleted from our server after OCR or QR recognition is perfomed (offline). We do NOT store ANY message content (text, multimedia or anything else).
{b}ERROR:{/b} Oops, no wit.ai API key could be found for the language {language}. :(
